problem.markdown:
Open Response Assessments have four possible steps: self-grading, staff grading, peer grading, and learner training.
>>If all four steps are active, what order do they go in?<<
(!) Training, then Self, then Peer, then Staff. ( ) Training, then Peer, then Self, then Staff. ( ) Self, then Training, then Peer, then Staff. (@) You can't have all four active in one assignment. (x@) Any order you want.
[explanation] You can drag to reposition the stages in any order you like. [explanation]
